name: The Curse of Rabenstein (Collector's Edition)
description:
This Collector's Edition contains:
  • The Curse of Rabenstein (physical release on a disk and/or SD card depending on the chosen platform)
  • Manual (8 pages, DIN A5, in English)
  • Cardboard box
  • Necklace with a wooden cross
  • Poster (DIN A3)
alsoFor: Amiga, Atari ST, Commodore 64, DOS, ZX Spectrum, ZX Spectrum Next | Combined View
